relation: 250mg tablets beginning with one daily for one week, then two daily for one week, then titrated according to body weight and tolerability to achieve 10-12 mg/kg daily for 2 years, followed by a 2-month washout
Placebo tablets beginning with one daily and increasing according to weight and perceived tolerability concerns for two years, followed by a 2-month washout
